> Hello Folks
>
> Just a brief notice to let everyone know about the seminars being
> held in Guelph and elsewhere this summer.
>
> There are just two spaces left for the swordsmithing course so if
> you're considering it, please get in touch with me, and if you know
> someone who might be interested, please pass this along.
>
>
> Swordsmithing course June 5-9 Floradale http://www.uoguelph.ca/
> ~iaido/gsjsa_smithing.htm
>
>
> Annual Spring Iaido and Jodo Seminar
> Guelph School of Japanese Sword Arts Martial arts
> Guelph School of Japanese Sword Arts Swordsmithing
> HyoHo Niten Ichiryu seminar
> Fall Sword Festival
> Thanks
> Kim.
